LanguageData.Exhausted.label: 지침
LanguageData.Exhausted.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: circumstance_phrase->with a visible look of exhaustion
LanguageData.Exhausted.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: circumstance_phrase->and unable to move a muscle
LanguageData.Exhausted.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[PAWN_nameDef]'s last project sits nearby, complete.
LanguageData.Exhausted.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[Quantity_adjphrase] [PersonJob]s look grateful for [PAWN_nameDef]'s heroic effort.
LanguageData.Exhausted.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[Quantity_adjphrase] [PersonJob]s lie nearby in a similar state.
LanguageData.Exhausted.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: desc_sentence->The scene takes place inside a newly-built [Community].
LanguageData.GaveBirth.label: 출산
LanguageData.GaveBirth.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[MOTHER_nameFull] lying in bed next to [MRECIPIENT_possessive] [baby], [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.GaveBirth.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: image->[MOTHER_nameFull] collapsed in a chair with [MRECIPIENT_possessive] [baby] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.GaveBirth.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: circumstance_phrase->[CHILD_nameFull], who is bloody and crying
LanguageData.GaveBirth.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: circumstance_phrase->[CHILD_nameFull], who is already trying to pull [CHILD_objective]self around
LanguageData.GaveBirth.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: circumstance_phrase->새끼 [CHILD_nameFull](을)를 낳으며 평온한 표정으로 주위를 살피는 모습
LanguageData.GaveBirth.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[Quantity_adjphrase] 마리의 [Animal]떼가 근처에서 평화롭게 자고 있습니다.
LanguageData.GaveBirth.rulePack.rulesStrings.15: desc_sentence->The scene takes place inside a newly-built [Community].

desc_sentence->꽁꽁 언 [Quantity_adjphrase] 마리의 [Animal]들의 시체가 주위에 쌓여있습니다.
desc_sentence->차가운 푸른 달이 뒤에 어렴풋이 보입니다.
desc_sentence->이 장면은 눈으로 덮인 [TreeType] 숲속에서 일어난 것 같습니다.
desc_sentence->이 장면은 냉동고 안에서 일어난 일처럼 보입니다.
desc_sentence->벌벌 떠는 [Quantity_adjphrase] 마리의 [Animal]들이 주위를 둘러싸고 있습니다.
